section.p: A test or instrument, often a questionaire, used to evaluate or assess a patient's mental health, within the context of a healthcare encounter.

ol.li:
Contains exactly one [1..1] assessmentInstrument with data type Code
Code indicating the assessment tool performed as part of this clinical service.

Contains exactly one [1..1] dateTimeAdmiinstered with data type Point In Time
The date and time the assessment was performed.

Contains exactly one [1..1] id with data type Id
A unique identifier for the assessment event.

Contains exactly one [1..1] remarks with data type String
Contains comments regarding the responses to the group of related assessment questions.

Contains exactly one [1..1] totalScore with data type Real
The total of the numeric values associated with each response in the assessment.

Contains zero or more [0..*] assesmentSection, where its type is Assessment Instrument Section
A group of responses to assessment questions.
Contains exactly one [1..1] patient, where its type is Patient
Contains zero or one [0..1] interviewer, where its type is Primary Performer
Contains exactly one [1..1] responsibleProvider, where its type is Responsible Party

Contains exactly one [1..1] dateTimeCompleted with data type Point In Time
The date and time the assessment was performed.
Contains zero or one [0..1] dataEnterer, where its type is Data Enterer
Contains zero or more [0..*] comments, where its type is Comment Event
